description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0. This affects an unknown part of the file /view/show_friend_request.php. The manipulation of the argument my_index leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-263595.
